item.title: Caterina Ferioloi's Passionate Performance In The Tearsmith Made Me Fall In Love With Romance Movies All Over Again â€” & I Can't Wait To See What's Next For The Italian Actress
item.description: The Tearsmith had a passionate performance from Caterina Ferioli, showing me why I love romance films, and I look forward to what she does next.

item.title: "I Kind Of Just Want To Give Him A Hug": Will Smith's 12% RT Sci-Fi Dud Leaves VFX Artists Feeling Sorry For M. Night Shyamalan
item.description: The Will Smith-led sci-fi movie with a 12% on Rotten Tomatoes leaves VFX artists at Corridor Crew feeling sorry for director M. Night Shyamalan.

item.title: 2025 Is The Year Of Pedro Pascal & It Officially Begins Next Week
item.description: Pedro Pascal will kick off one of his best years yet with Freaky Tales, followed by The Fantastic Four, The Last of Us, and a lot more.
